test_code_analysis: The tests verify the login functionality of a Flask authentication controller, covering scenarios including successful login, invalid credentials, missing username or password, JSON errors, and general exceptions.

The tests verify the login functionality of the account lock controller, covering scenarios such as successful login, invalid data input, login failure due to incorrect credentials, and the absence of a JSON body in the request.

The tests verify the account lockout functionality of a login endpoint, covering scenarios like successful login, account lockout due to multiple failed attempts, unauthorized access, and invalid data handling.
